mapper.select:
SELECT BALL_PROBABILITY_ID ballProbabilityId, RED_BALL_ONE redBallOne, RED_BALL_TWO redBallTwo, RED_BALL_THREE redBallThree, RED_BALL_FOUR redBallFour, RED_BALL_FIVE redBallFive, RED_BALL_SIX redBallSix, RED_BALL_SEVEN redBallSeven, RED_BALL_EIGHT redBallEight, RED_BALL_NINE redBallNine, RED_BALL_TEN redBallTen, RED_BALL_ELEVEN redBallEleven, RED_BALL_TWELVE redBallTwelve, RED_BALL_THIRTEEN redBallThirteen, RED_BALL_FOURTEEN redBallFourteen, RED_BALL_FIFTEEN redBallFifteen, RED_BALL_SIXTEEN redBallSixteen, RED_BALL_SEVENTEEN redBallSeventeen, RED_BALL_EIGHTEEN redBallEighteen, RED_BALL_NINETEEN redBallNineteen, RED_BALL_TWENTY redBallTwenty, RED_BALL_TWENTY_ONE redBallTwentyOne, RED_BALL_TWENTY_TWO redBallTwentyTwo, RED_BALL_TWENTY_THREE redBallTwentyThree, RED_BALL_TWENTY_FOUR redBallTwentyFour, RED_BALL_TWENTY_FIVE redBallTwentyFive, RED_BALL_TWENTY_SIX redBallTwentySix, RED_BALL_TWENTY_SEVEN redBallTwentySeven, RED_BALL_TWENTY_EIGHT redBallTwentyEight, RED_BALL_TWENTY_NINE redBallTwentyNine, RED_BALL_THIRTY redBallThirty, RED_BALL_THIRTY_ONE redBallThirtyOne, RED_BALL_THIRTY_TWO redBallThirtyTwo, RED_BALL_THIRTY_THREE redBallThirtyThree, LAST_UPDATE_DATE lastUpdateDate FROM THIRTY_RED_BALL_PROBABILITY
LIMIT #{minValue},#{maxValue}
